creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Wilson Grabill
description: shrimp in curled position with long feelers pointing downward; curving lines and grey and black curlicues along top edge and LR; inscription L
marks: at L: {Hakuin Osho iwaku / Higenagaku koshimagarum {Kakutei dojin rokusha}
title: Shrimp
